0 4 1 * * apt update && apt upgrade -y >> /var/log/apt-upgrade.log 2>&1

59 23 * * * /usr/sbin/logrotate /etc/logrotate.conf

#!/bin/bash
set -euo pipefail

case "${1:-}" in
    list)
        echo "=== Current Cron Jobs ==="
        crontab -l
        ;;
    add)
        if [ -z "${2:-}" ]; then
            echo "Usage: $0 add '<cron-line>'"
            echo "Example: $0 add '0 2 * * * /path/to/script.sh'"
            exit 1
        fi
        (crontab -l 2>/dev/null; echo "$2") | crontab -
        echo "‚úì Cron job added"
        ;;
    remove)
        LINE_NUM="${2:-}"
        if [ -z "$LINE_NUM" ]; then
            echo "Usage: $0 remove <line-number>"
            crontab -l | nl
            exit 1
        fi
        crontab -l | sed "${LINE_NUM}d" | crontab -
        echo "‚úì Cron job removed"
        ;;
    logs)
        echo "=== Recent Cron Activity ==="
        grep CRON /var/log/syslog | tail -20
        ;;
    test)
        SCRIPT="${2:-}"
        if [ -z "$SCRIPT" ]; then
            echo "Usage: $0 test <script-path>"
            exit 1
        fi
        echo "Testing: $SCRIPT"
        bash -c "$SCRIPT"
        ;;
    *)
        echo "Cron Job Manager"
        echo ""
        echo "Usage: $0 <command> [args]"
        echo ""
        echo "Commands:"
        echo "  list              Show current cron jobs"
        echo "  add '<line>'      Add new cron job"
        echo "  remove <num>      Remove cron job by line number"
        echo "  logs              View recent cron activity"
        echo "  test <script>     Test script before adding to cron"
        ;;
esac
EOF
